mapper.select: select distinct A.notice_board_no, A.writer, A.corrector, A.title, A.create_date, A.correct_date, A.hits, A.content, A.is_inactive, (select count(*) from comment A where A.notice_board_no = B.notice_board_no) comment_count from notice_board A left join comment B on A.notice_board_no = B.notice_board_no where is_inactive = 0 limit #{num},20
select count(*) from notice_board where is_inactive = 0;
select notice_board_no, writer, corrector, title, create_date, correct_date, hits, content, is_inactive from notice_board where notice_board_no = ${id}
update notice_board set is_inactive = 0 where notice_board_no = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_board VALUES(default, '${writer}', null, '${title}', #{createDate}, null, 0, '${content}', false)
mapper.update: UPDATE notice_board set corrector = #{corrector}, title = #{title}, content = #{contents}, correct_date = now() WHERE notice_board_no = ${id}
mapper.delete: UPDATE notice_board set is_inactive = true WHERE notice_board_no = ${id}
